overview: Ride along as four sick teams race their way across the US skating, filming, causing mayhem, and earning points for a chance to be Thrasher Magazineâ€™s 2007 King of the Road! A recap of all the action that went down on KOTR 2007 featuring riders from Blind, Foundation, Black Label, and Zoo York.
tagline: 20 AMAZING SKATEBOARDERS, TWO WEEKS OF PURE HELL, ONE GNARLY DVD!
title: Thrasher - King of the Road 2007
